data.title: Newton Running Company
data.meta_description: Newton Running Company | 5,622 followers on LinkedIn. We exist so that every stride is better. Founded in Boulder, Colorado by a group of runners and coaches, Newton Running is the leading Natural Running footwear brand. Using patented Action/Reactionâ„¢ technology, Newton Running shoes help runners achieve a more efficient running form.

LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.
